RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 1, 2023 Allo wed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHOCOLATE RABBIT chased leader to the turn, took over with complete domination. DASH OF FIRE unhurried early from off rail to the stretch, ran on for place. CAT CORN trailed the field to the stretch rallied along late for show spot. PETTY THIEF quickly to the front overtaken into turn with no response. JIM'S RIVER RUNNER tried to keep up for a half with no response when needed.

ENTRY.NAME: Jim's River Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Rabbit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the turn, took over with complete domination

ENTRY.NAME: Dash of Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early from off rail to the stretch, ran on for place

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Corn
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed the field to the stretch rallied along late for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Petty Thief
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly to the front overtaken into turn with no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 48. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Preferenc e To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000 In Last 5 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPUN PRETTY sent Immediately to the front, carved off mediocre splits throughout to stay well clear. GIMME CLEARANCE dueled briefly with winner while chasing to secure the place spot while well clear of the rest. LATE DATE raced along evenly, swerved sharply in the far turn, no chance. SWEETER THAN HONEY through after half and dropped far back from the far turn. OUTPOST GIRL good position to far turn went wrong and fell and subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Outpost Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn went wrong and fell, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Clearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled briefly with winner while chasing to hold the place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Sweeter Than Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half and dropped far back from the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Late Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly, swerved sharply in the far turn, no chance

ENTRY.NAME: Spun Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent Immediately to the front, carved off mediocre splits, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter J. Sheppell, John Royer & Godolphin

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 79. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AZAMANA EMPIRE perfectly position inside to far turn, angled out to go clear. DAME JOVIALE inside speed to set a pressured pace to stretch, held place. MISS BRIGHTSIDE no speed to far turn, rallied along inside for the show spot. QUARIA BRAVA good position throughout, angled out into stretch while evenly. FREE TIME showed no speed to far turn, had no response when needed. MIRUS raced along evenly with no response from far turn. NIGHT KISS saved ground throughout with no response when needed. JACKIE'S LOVE pressed pace to the half with a steady fade thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: Azamana Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfectly position inside to far turn, angled out to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: Dame Joviale
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernard Jacqueline and Rath Jeffrey R W
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to set a pressured pace to stretch, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie's Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to the half with a steady fade thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Night Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Quaria Brava
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout, angled out into stretch while evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Brightside
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied along inside for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Mirus
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Free Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed no speed to far turn, had no response when needed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOODASIWONSWAS sharp to the front, well rated throughout while proving tons the best today under good handling to the wire. TENPAK tracked leaders off rail to the turn, rallied four wide into the stretch for place while no match for the winner, holding the place spot. OVERLY D'ORO had a terrible start, raced five wide into the turn for show spot in a gallant effort after the poor break from the gate. COLOR FIELD chased top pair to the turn while fading in the stretch run. WHISTLEWHILEYOUMOW chased winner to quarter pole while giving way in the stretch run. ALL ABOUT CROGE saved ground throughout to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Goodasiwonswas
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, well rated throughout, tons the best today

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Whistlewhileyoumow
ENTRY.OWNER: AOM Racing Stables LLC and Diamond Hands Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to quarter pole while giving way in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Color Field
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the turn while fading in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Tenpak
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Tennant Angela and Tennant Kurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders off rail to turn, rallied four wide for place

ENTRY.NAME: Overly d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: had a terrible start, race five wide into the turn for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 88. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not C onsidered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUBDUED perfect position to far turn, rallied to glide to the wire in time under stout handling. J W RUCKUS secured the rail to far turn, tried hard stretch, dueled missed. VIOLIN MAKER no speed to far turn, kicked in through the stretch for show spot. ATTORNEY TIM unhurried to far turn with a mild bid in the stretch run. SCAT SHACK dueled with heavy pressure to the stretch, used up while empty. FERRYBOAT hounded winner for three quarters with nothing left in the drive. IN HONOR OF ARTIE steadily faded throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: In Honor of Artie
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Attorney Tim
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn with a mild bid in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: J W Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: secured the rail to far turn, tried hard stretch, dueled missed

ENTRY.NAME: Scat Shack
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled with heavy pressure to the stretch, used up while empty

ENTRY.NAME: Ferryboat
ENTRY.COMMENT: hounded winner for three quarters with nothing left in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Subdued
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position to far turn, rallied to glide to wire in time

ENTRY.NAME: Violin Maker
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, kicked in through the stretch for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances ) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL BOHEMIO pressured pace to the half, took over into turn and held sway in the stretch run. MISTER MAN inside trip to the turn, shifted out to quarter pole, no match. FIRERY TALE raced along evenly with no late kick when needed. ORB OF THE BORO brief speed to turn, emptied out and backed up readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to the turn, shifted out to quarter pole, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Orb of the Boro
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed to turn, emptied out and backed up readily

ENTRY.NAME: Firery Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: El Bohemio
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured pace to the half, took over into turn, held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 1, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Re gistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LEVEE PROUD good position throughout, rallied in earnest to go clear late under stout handling to the wire. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR dueled from two to the stretch run, stayed game but outkicked in the final sixteenth. DROP IT dueled along from inside to the stretch run but weakened in the late going. MONEY PIT raced along evenly throughout with no late kick when needed in the final furlong. HEY RAY good position between horses early on, went up three wide around the turn but came up empty in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Money Pit
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Ray
ENTRY.OWNER: Sandy Stephen S and Sandy Brenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position between horses early on went up three wide, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Drop It
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled along from inside to the stretch run, weakened late going

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two to the stretch run, stayed game outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Levee Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout, rallied in earnest to go clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WRITTENINTHESTARS lagged back early on, steady inside move to far turn, up in time. SATURDAY LONG LEGS no speed to far turn, wide run into stretch to finish up well. SOUTHERN BREEZE chased leader to the stretch, short late lead, outkicked to wire. OUR FLAG FLYING unhurried to far turn, rallied between horses stretch coming on. WESTERN MOON had an awkward start from the gate with no speed to far turn, launched a late run through traffic in the stretch run and finished up well to the wire. SPUNS SON no hurry from the gate, lagged back to far turn, leveled off late. POGOERIACH speed to the front, led to far turn, pressured stretch weakened. SOMOS raced along evenly to the far turn with nothing left in the drive. ROENICK never threatened throughout. THE RED FOX good position for to the half but emptied out from far turn. UNCLE STEVE'S MOON dropped back quickly while never a threat. NO MORE GUNS was rowdy loading and through at the half to drop far back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Somos
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to the far turn with nothing left in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Southern Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the stretch, short late lead, outkicked to wire

ENTRY.NAME: No More Guns
ENTRY.COMMENT: was rowdy loading and through after the half, dropping far back

ENTRY.NAME: Writteninthestars
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back early on, steady inside move to far turn, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Spuns Son
ENTRY.OWNER: Dewald Henry W and Dewald Devin
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry from the gate, lagged back to far turn, leveled off late

ENTRY.NAME: The Red Fox
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position for to the half but emptied out from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Steve's Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back quickly while never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Saturday Long Legs
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, wide run into stretch to finish up well

ENTRY.NAME: Roenick
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Pogoeriach
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, led to far turn, pressured stretch weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Western Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start from the gate, no speed to far turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Our Flag Flying
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to far turn, rallied between horses stretch coming on
